MIA (Modular Image Analysis)

Modular, object-based analysis for ImageJ/Fiji

View on GitHub
Introduction Getting started Modules List of modules Macros Extending MIA
Back to module list

Create distance map

Description

Parameters

  • Input objects
    • Type: InputObjectsP
  • Input image
    • Type: InputImageP
  • Output image
    • Type: OutputImageP
  • Reference mode
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Distance from object centroid
    • Choices:
      • Distance from object centroid
      • Distance from object edge
  • Invert map within objects
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Masking mode
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Inside and outside
    • Choices:
      • Inside and outside
      • Inside only
      • Outside only
  • Normalise map per object
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: false
  • Spatial units
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Pixel
    • Choices:
      • Calibrated
      • Pixel
ModularImageAnalysis is maintained by SJCross. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
